game_description: You are the owner of a newly opened pawn shop. You need to carefully examine the items brought by clients, because some of them are fake! If you make the right choice, you earn money! Your shop is not in the best condition and does not have a good reputation. With the money you earn, you can upgrade your store and improve your prestige.
review_4: Works great on the Quest 2 but on the Quest 1 the computer screen on the desk does not show the item. I tried uninstalling and reinstalling still the same problem.
